mapper.insert: insert into `userbankinfo` (bankForkName, bankName, accountNumber,logininfo_id, accountName) values (#{bankForkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logininfo.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select b.id, b.bankForkName, b.bankName, b.accountNumber, b.accountName, l.id as l_id,l.username as l_username from `userbankinfo` b JOIN logininfo l on b.logininfo_id = l.id where b.logininfo_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
